title: Early sale help
body: Will the early sale for this month be at the very end of this month? It's my first time buying something from the early sale and I kinda got really confused whether it's at the start of the month, at the middle or the end.

replies.body: The sales schedule, like [May Sales ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/may-sales-schedule-0?ref=rss&utm_source=dlvr.it&utm_medium=twitter)schedule, tries to give you a heads up of upcoming goodies for that month.  The content that you see in that list is for once May begins.  There's no date for when a specific item will go on sale, though, so keep an eye out in the client.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Starguardian jinx was announced for april early sales but has not gone on sale. All sales have been announced up until may 1st. This kind of false advertising pisses me off because people like me check the news every few days of the month waiting for the skin and for it not to come out is just a slap in the face.
